actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide that the laws restricting the coastwise trade to vessels of the United States shall not apply to certain hovercraft on routes over land or over water only as an incidental part thereof.

summary.text: Provides that the laws restricting the coastwise trade to vessels of the United States shall not apply to qualified hovercraft on routes over land or over water only as an incidental part thereof, if a permit is obtained pursuant to regulations to be established by the Secretary of Commerce.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the laws restricting the coastwise trade to vessels of the United States shall not apply to certain hovercraft on routes over land or over water only as an incidental part thereof.
